title: Battle Boss Daily Missions
body: I purchased the Dungeon pass and I am confused as to if I am supposed to be getting daily missions or it was only a single "Game Start: Battle Boss Daily" that I misinterpreted as additional daily chances for tickets.  Frankly the current amount of missions is really hard to manage using the small pop-up window.  Please let me know if I am supposed to be seeing additional daily missions at all and if so why am I not seeing one for today.

replies.body: I bought my dungeon pass pre late 21/8 was just wondering if this will effect how much tickets i get over all i'll be grinding to get most the quest done though.

I've had to do a bit of digging to figure out just what is going on with these daily missions to be sure of why we don't have a second daily today. As it turns out, the devs setup this first daily to last a bit longer than one day so that everyone has a chance to complete it and start the dungeon pass mission lines if they bought the pass. We should be getting the second daily starting tomorrow, but definitely let me know if you don't see it around 11am local time!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jrBJF5qU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-12T02:27:38.278+0000)

> I've had to do a bit of digging to figure out just what is going on with these daily missions to be sure of why we don't have a second daily today. As it turns out, the devs setup this first daily to last a bit longer than one day so that everyone has a chance to complete it and start the dungeon pass mission lines if they bought the pass. We should be getting the second daily starting tomorrow, but definitely let me know if you don't see it around 11am local time!

I bought the battle pass yesterday and completed the daily mission and have yet to receive one for Friday, maybe I purchased it after the deadline for the first one?

That would definitely not be daily as that's over 48 hours.  That also conveniently for riot throws off the math of buying orbs if they are 10 tickets a mission.   Thanks for the help and if it does not appear I will repost.
how many tickets do you get for each  battle boss daily mission? are they the same objective every day?
